product_name: Smith Scope Snow Goggles - Charcoal Batik Frame
long_description: The Smith Scope Charcoal Batik snow goggles feature a rose-tinted Blue Sensor Mirror lens, good fog control and a comfortable fit, all for an excellent value. Blue Sensor Mirror lens features a light rose tint and 70% visible light transmission to maximize color definition and increase depth perception in flat light. Vents at the top of the cylindrical lens help combat fogging. Cushy single-layer face foam offers a good seal against your face. Extra-wide adjustable strap is backed with a silicone bead so it stays in place on your helmet. The Smith Scope snow goggles fit medium-size faces and come with a microfiber storage bag.
